entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
